Title: Object: Papyrus Gardiner 2
Description: P.Gardiner 2; frame 29; Hieratic text: Recto (l. 296-307): Coffin Text spell 581, 1006 Verso (l. 355-80/385-423): Coffin Text spell 479
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gestermann, L. 2003. Neues zu Pap. Gardiner II (BM EA 10676), in Z. A. Hawass and L. Pinch Brock (eds.), Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty- first Century: Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists Cairo, 2000, vol. 1, 202-8. Cairo and New York: The American University in Cairo Press. Regulski, I. 2018. Writing habits as identity marker: on sign formation in Papyrus Gardiner II, in: S.A. Gulden, K. van der Moezel, U. Verhoeven (eds), Ägyptologische „Binsen“-Weisheiten III. Formen und Funktionen von Zeichenliste und Paläographie. Mainz, 235-265.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381090) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381090)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fragile, fractured, discoloured, loss Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Displayed in Room 62 until 1992 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
